_metadata.description: Classification framework for job scam detection. Referenced in prompt_scam_analysis.py lines 3-4. Based on academic research (Ravenelle et al., 2022) and FTC guidelines.

Financial Mark Scams.description: Jobs that don't exist; designed to extract money/information

subcategories.name: Credit Score Check Scam
subcategories.description: Requests sensitive information (SSN, DOB) under guise of credit/background check

subcategories.name: Advance Fee Fraud
subcategories.description: Upfront payment for training, equipment, supplies, certification, or background checks

subcategories.name: Overpayment/Fake Check Scheme
subcategories.description: Worker receives check to purchase items, check later bounces

subcategories.name: Payment Processing Scam
subcategories.description: Requests bank account info or asks worker to transfer funds between accounts

subcategories.name: Work-from-Home Scam
subcategories.description: Unrealistic earnings claims ($1000s/month) with minimal effort/experience required

Scapegoat Scams.description: Illegal activities disguised as legitimate employment

subcategories.name: Package Reshipping/Mule
subcategories.description: Worker unknowingly receives and ships stolen goods or contraband

subcategories.name: Money Mule Operation
subcategories.description: Transferring money obtained through illegal means

subcategories.name: Check Printing/Financial Fraud
subcategories.description: Creating or processing fraudulent financial documents

subcategories.name: Identity Theft Operation
subcategories.description: Job is cover for harvesting and exploiting personal information

subcategories.name: Pyramid Scheme
subcategories.description: Primary earnings from recruitment fees, not product sales

subcategories.name: Questionable MLM
subcategories.description: Requires large upfront inventory purchase; emphasis on recruitment over retail sales

subcategories.name: Advance Fee Placement
subcategories.description: Fake staffing agency charges upfront fees for job placement

subcategories.name: Government Job Scam
subcategories.description: Fraudulent federal/postal service job offers requiring payment

subcategories.name: Company Impersonation
subcategories.description: Uses real company name/logo without authorization

subcategories.name: Fake Recruiter
subcategories.description: Impersonates legitimate recruiter from known company

communication.personal_email: Communication from personal email (Gmail, Yahoo) not company domain
communication.poor_grammar: Poor grammar, spelling errors, or unprofessional language
communication.pressure_tactics: Pressure to respond immediately or accept offer quickly
communication.text_only_interview: Interview conducted entirely via text/chat (no video/phone)
communication.vague_answers: Vague or evasive answers about company/role details

financial.upfront_payment: Requests payment upfront for any reason (equipment, training, background check)
financial.bank_info_request: Asks for bank account, credit card, or SSN before job offer
financial.early_financial_info: Requests financial information early in process (before conditional offer)
financial.unrealistic_salary: Promises unrealistic salary for skill level/experience
financial.fake_check_scheme: Asks to deposit check and return portion of money
financial.starter_kit_purchase: Requires purchase of starter kit or inventory
financial.suspicious_payment_methods: Payment via wire transfer, cryptocurrency, gift cards, or prepaid cards

job_posting.unrealistic_pay: Extremely high pay for minimal experience/effort
job_posting.too_good_to_be_true: "Too good to be true" promises (work from home, set own hours, $5000+/month)
job_posting.no_company_info: No legitimate company information or website
job_posting.multiple_platforms: Posted on multiple platforms with different company names
job_posting.coordinates_location: Location listed as coordinates instead of address

hiring_process.no_interview: Job offer without interview or after brief text exchange
hiring_process.no_formal_process: No formal application or background check
hiring_process.early_document_request: Asks for personal documents (ID, SSN) before conditional offer
hiring_process.poor_offer_letter: Sends offer letter with spelling/formatting errors
hiring_process.unverifiable_company: Unable to verify company exists or has legitimate online presence

work_activity.package_reshipping: Asked to receive and reship packages to unknown addresses
work_activity.money_movement: Instructed to move money between accounts
work_activity.recruitment_focus: Required to recruit others as primary job function
work_activity.check_processing: Tasks involve receiving checks and making purchases
work_activity.payment_processing: Work involves processing payments for others

vulnerability_factors.social_isolation: Social isolation (limited network to verify opportunity)
vulnerability_factors.demographic_targeting: Specific demographic targeting (students, seniors, gig workers)
